website_summaries.verdict: This affordable set of sandwich decrusters comes with a generous variety of cute shapes and includes a few handy extras, too.
pros: Comes with 10 sandwich cutters, three fruit and veggie cutters, and a free ebook filled with tips and inspiration
Earns praise for creating shapes that are neat and clean
Sandwich cutters are sturdy and durable
cons: May not work well with smaller bread slices

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Works very well and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Works very well and great quality. I don’t worry about my son playing with them as they aren’t sharp to touch. I recommend rolling your bread and keeping ingredients as central as you can as this helps keep the sandwich clean and without jelly splurting out. Would but again!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are so many different shapes and choices. However, overall I don’t like this type of sandwich cutter. It’s awkward to use and will only work with larger pieces of bread. My daughter is delighted with the shapes. She didn’t eat her sandwiches before for lunch and now she does. So that’s a plus. Using them is frustrating because the cuts make it difficult to keep the sandwich together and not mess up the shape. I tell you what regular cookie cutters are way easier to use and I know that now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Black

customer_reviews.title: They do what there supposed to
customer_reviews.text: They do work but if going to spread something soft cut the bread first so you don't explode sandwich guts thus messing up shape. It wouldn't hurt if tad sharper but they do cut through bread slices. They are big so might be good idea for company to make these cutters but in slightly smaller size not as small as metal cutters they give you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beth Crowther

customer_reviews.title: well made and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help my toddler eat more veggies and fruits using the fruit cutters and to also pack some sandwiches for daycare. I like that several of the sandwich cutters break up into smaller pieces making it easier for my little one to grab them. I've also been cutting apples and other fruits and I'm very pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Guacamole

customer_reviews.title: We’ve only used the heart one so far but I ...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used the heart one so far but I got to get my 5 year old to eat a sandwich for the first time in forever (starts school in the fall). Can’t wait to try the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I made my daughter a PB&J and I had to smash the sandwich really bad for the cutters to cut through
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is just me but I can't get the sandwich cutters to cut through two pieces of bread. I made my daughter a PB&J and I had to smash the sandwich really bad for the cutters to cut through. The veggie cutters, on the other hand, work really well. Just made some flower shaped carrots last night.
customer_reviews.author: CJRS

customer_reviews.title: Cute cutters at a pretty great price
customer_reviews.text: Cute cutters at a pretty great price. The small fruit and veggie cutters could be a bit stronger since they seem to bend if used on really hard foods/fruits/veggies. But the sandwich cutters are doing their job well and I love the variety of shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Rsika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get my picky eater to finish his meals
customer_reviews.text: I love these - they’ve helped my toddler finish his entire sandwich (which used to be a struggle). I also use the little metal cutouts (star, flower, and heart) to cut up cheese, fruit, etc. These make eating (and prepping) more fun for everyone. Worth the money if you have little kids and make an effort to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my picky eater and they have been great! The sandwich cutters are plenty durable. It takes a bit of a learning curve to get the shapes out perfectly but it is easy to do with a bit of practice! I also love the included fruit cutters; I use them for everything and it is really fun! Everything goes into the dishwasher so cleanup is super easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love making my son's lunch extra special. He's three years old and goes to day care twice a week and I use these cutters to give him something extra special for those days. They are super cute and work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup, Great quality, Excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I have four daughters and the usual "lunch order" for sandwich day is the crust off, please! But not anymore thanks to this set. The quality is sturdy and cleanup was no fuss. They arrived a day ahead of schedule neatly packaged and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Plus you cannot beat the price of these for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Works great and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product! My kids love the fun shapes! They work well and cut even with several layers of meat. :) the only bump in the road I encountered was they are a tad bit long so the bottom or the top crust is included in the shape. But definitely worth the purchase and would recommend to anyone looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ewalt

customer_reviews.title: Lunch Box Success!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for me friend’s son as a small gift. He absolutely loves them! We finally found a way to get him to eat healthier sandwhiches, since he likes the different shapes. So far the puppy shape is his favorite! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Initial D

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and cute
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old who just started kindergarten loves these cute cutters. His class mates ask him how he makes the shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sha

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy to use. Great product a must have if you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Despina Makris

customer_reviews.title: They acutally cut through the bread!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for such a good product. We've used the dinosaur on the most and my son loves it. We only got it a couple days ago but I feel like it definitely has helped us with a picky eater. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps kiddos eat more of their lunch!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to change up our normal lunch sandwiches. The bonus cutters are awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Grassi

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these because my 2 year old has become ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my 2 year old has become such a picky eater. She loves the shapes and is eating more of her meals now because of them. These are exactly what we needed, and they arrived as expected.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are great for the kids and help stimulate them to eat more sandwiches as they can choose from all these cool shapes. I would give these cutters 5 stars if they were just a little bit smaller. Most of the bread I buy are too small for some of the cutters and thus leave some gaps or crust. But still recommend as this can be countered by buying larger bread slices.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: These are great because you don’t lose half the sandwich in cutting it. It cuts as close to the crust as possible. Edges are sharpe enough to cut out shapes easily but not sharp enough to worry about little one’s getting near. Just right!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely adore these cutters! I use them for my daughters bento lunch boxes each day and she said her classmates rave about her cute sandwiches!
customer_reviews.author: Misscrimson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product , very good quality . The company really cares you are satisfied with your product as well, it's not just another sale to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old daughter loves these shapes! We originally bought them for her school lunches and her sandwiches. But since she’s not in school right now, she’s been using them for pancake shapes! Lots of uses, really good sizes, pretty durable, and with all the shapes, they keep your little ones from getting bored!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Ciaramitaro

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my grandkids. My daughter said ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandkids. My daughter said they were so excited to eat their “dolphin” and “puzzle” sandwiches!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Constable

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! My son loves his lil shaped sandwiches at lunch time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J

customer_reviews.title: Son is delighted by his lunch now!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used all of the items that came in the box, but I’ve had a great experience using a couple of the sandwich cutters. My son has finally taken more interest in the sandwiches I pack for him thanks to these fun shapes! He is delighted by the shapes and EATS his lunch now = one happy momma!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunches!!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love opening their lunches at school to see which design they got for the day w their sandwich!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Small

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This set is very cute. I like all the different options and the tools are really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the fun shapes for her sandwiches. They are a little large for regular bread. You need to buy the bigger slices to make sure some of the larger shapes fit, like the hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute for all
customer_reviews.text: these are really cute and perfectly cut off the crust without losing half the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Three

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as pictured and work really well. Bought them for school snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and an adorable product
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and an adorable product! My 3 year old loves making her sandwiches almost as much as she enjoys eating sandwiches now! I am totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Elwess

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME. makes lunch time fun for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME. makes lunch time fun for my daughter :) only bad part is that ours didn't come with the small metal heart cutout. I got a second flower cutout instead. Still, gun product.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater . My son was not interested in eating . Since purchasing the sandwich cutter and making his meal more appealing to him . He started eating more often . Best purchase I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Keilly

customer_reviews.title: These are even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are even better than I expected! They cut easily through bread and turkey and cheese. My kids absolutely love them. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoys the different designs the cutters make her sandwich into. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Missy M

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves the shapes and is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My daughter thinks they’re fun and is actually more willing to eat food.
customer_reviews.author: johanna318

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Easy to use & clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! So easy to use and clean! :) They certainly exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable. I just need to find bread large enough.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Who makes lunchtime so much more fun Bearberry
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Great quality and a whole Lotta fun! The kids love it and so do I. The quality is very good and far superior to other ones that I’ve seen on Amazon or other places. Definitely glad I made this purchase will definitely be buying more in the future and recommending to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Boombastic

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived with the free veggie cutters missing! Each of the sandwich cutters was individually wrapped and the star one was broken. The broken pieces were not in the box or bag, which means it was broken before the box was put together. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: K. Boret

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My son hates eating. Now, with little effort my son is eating his and finishing sandwich. Using different shapes every time should keep him interested. Product is high quality and packed nicely. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Hratch M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality made products and so fun for my preschool aged son and I! We’ve loved cutting fruits, veggies, sandwiches, pancakes, and quesadillas! It’s given his lunches an extra touch :) smooth delivery and the seller reaches out personally to make sure everything was satisfactory. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Marin

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are seriously the best! Super cute, great quality and easy to use and clean! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Lunchtime fun
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are so fun for my daughters lunch. I love that when I cut though the sandwich no pieces get stuck in the smaller parts such as the dinosaur head the whole section of sandwich comes out perfectly. They arrived on time and nothing was damaged. I received follow up with the seller once they were delivered and everything was to my liking. I really appreciate that personal touch you dont really receive when purchasing items on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: We wanted them to feel special and have to have fun eating the sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I am the Child Nutrition Director for a school. We used these to make the sandwiches for our younger students. We wanted them to feel special and have to have fun eating the sandwiches. You do have to take your time with making the sandwiches for them to turn out just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute designs, easy to use, easy to clean. Unfortunately, I have been unable to nicely cut pbj sandwiches without mangling the sandwich. I think they'll work better on ham/cheese sandwiches, but we mostly do pbj.
customer_reviews.author: PMCon

customer_reviews.title: Needs more durability
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit hard to cut through a sandwich so thats kind of a pain but my daughter loves her sandwiches coming in different shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! packet perfectly and I purchased for my granddaughter but I secretly like cutting my sandwiches with these too! =)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella V.

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves opening his lunch box to find his sandwiches in different shapes..
customer_reviews.author: Sinbar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fruit stampers and my kids love picking the shapes for their sandwiches. Should’ve bought these a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Even the little puzzle piece one came out great. Makes lunches a bit more fun
customer_reviews.text: These work surprisingly well. Even the little puzzle piece one came out great. Makes lunches a bit more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Parkmom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: A really great and fun collection at a good price. Breakfasts are more fun now!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get kids to easy new foods?
customer_reviews.text: This set makes food so much fun, total game changer, especially if your kid is a crazy picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth anne Fox

customer_reviews.title: Happy children!
customer_reviews.text: I loves these. They work great for my picky eaters, and they clean easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product to make you smile
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my kids love the surprise each time they open their lunchboxes.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found these easy to use as they actually cut thru the bread with little effort. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, make funny food every time. Recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Luck

customer_reviews.title: Love the designs of these
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs of these. Overall, they work pretty well. Some of them do not cut all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product would definitely recommend this to other parents for ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid always was a grazer but now with the variety of shapes he eats the sandwiches i make as suppose to before. Great product would definitely recommend this to other parents for those stubborn kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Castanon

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We use both the sandwich cutters and fruit cutters for our little guys lunch. He loves the shapes and they are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey P

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are just ok. My daughter enjoys the shapes, but the cutters are flimsy. They don't cut as much as they smoosh sandwiches. I push them in and then use a knife to cut away the edges. The smaller vegetable cutters are pretty effective though. Too bad the rest of them aren't metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea. I tried to use them to cut my children's sandwiches, but it just squishes the sandwich until it, finally, cuts through. It would work better if the edges weren't so dull.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah030192

product_meta.title: Hibery Autumn Set-Maple, Turkey, Pumpkin, Acorn, Oak Leaf, Squirre 12 Piece Fall Thanksgiving Cookie Cutters, s, Various
product_meta.description: ❤ never experience the pain of forcing your kids to eat again! ❤when fussy eaters realize how fun meal time can be. . They will even look forward to it From now on! our sandwich cutters are loved by boys, girls, and every parent! well. . I mean, who doesn’t like when their kids enjoy eating healthy, right! ? ❤ perfect gift idea for moms! ❤This is the perfect gift that all moms will adore. . and they will thank you for it when their lives get ten times easier during family meal time! ❤ high-quality products for our high-quality customers! ❤We cannot stress enough that quality is our top priority, therefore, we only use high-quality food grade materials for our products. your health and safety is far too important to settle for cheap materials to save a few bucks, especially products that come in contact with food. - product measurements -Elephants: 9. 5 cm x 9. 2 cm x 2. 5 cm Dinosaurs: 10. 5 cm x 10. 5 cm x 2. 7 cm Butterfly: 10 cm x 10. 3 cm x 2. 7 cm hearts: 12. 5 cm x 12. 5 cm x 2. 7 cm jigsaw: 9. 5 cm x 9. 5 cm x 2. 5 cm Dolphins: 9. 5 cm x 9. 5 cm x 2. 5 cm Puppy: 9. 5 cm x 9. 3 cm x 2. 5 cm Star: 11. 5 cm x 11. 5 cm x 2. 5 cm vehicles: 10. 3 cm x 9. 5 cm x 2. 5 cm crust-free square: 10. 5 cm x 10. 5 x 2. 5 cm * please measure your bread size before buying! what are you still Waiting For! ? Order now and start creating your culinary Masterpiece!
feature_bullets: ✅ having a hard time getting your kids to eat? – Say no more! Bearberry’s sandwich cutters will change that forever! Making healthy food Fun for your children will be mind-blowingly easy with our sandwich stamps! ! From now on, meal time Will be delightful for those picky eaters once they see their boring sandwiches transformed into cute animals and shapes! Our sandwich cutters are perfect for all occasions: From breakfast to school lunches, in bento boxes, at birthday parties, picnics and more!

✅ premium BPA-free food grade materials – quality and safety for our customers is bearberry's top priority. All of our products are made from 100% non-toxic, BPA-free, phthalate-free, mercury-free, lead-free, food grade plastic that is compliant with industry standards. That's why our products are toddler-friendly and perfect for all ages!

✅ 10 colorful shapes for Boys and girls – we know how Creative kids are these days! That’s why we’re offering 10 colorful, fun shapes including; dinosaurs, Puppy, Dolphins, cars, Butterfly, hearts, elephants, Star, jigsaw puzzle, and crust-free square! Pro tip: mix and match using different shapes Each day to surprise your kids!

✅ multi-purpose and versatile – they are ‘sandwich cutters’ but there are millions of ways you can have fun with our amazing product! They work with cookies, vegetables, fruits, pancakes, toast, ham, omelets, cheese, rice krispies, and much more! Well. . Basically use with any type of food to MAKE your little one smile!

✅ FREE bonus gifts in box! ! – just when you thought ‘wow, can this deal even get any better?’ Yes! It can! Because we are giving you 3 stainless steel veggie/fruit cutters for free! ! These veggie/fruit cutters come in 3 shapes including; Star, flower, and heart. The combo of our sandwich cutters and veggie/fruit stamps will change your kids’ world permanently! Moreover, you'll get a free e-book full of tips, tricks, and recipe!
